      • getLocations

        public java.util.ArrayList<Location> getLocations()
        Returns the list of locations that are saved to this user. When dealing with this list order should be preserved as the indexes are important to the add and remove functions
        Returns:
        the list of locations that are saved to this user

      • setCurrentLoc

        public boolean setCurrentLoc(Location location)
        Set the current location to the given location object
        Parameters:
        location - the location that will be the new current location for this user.
        Returns:
        true is the location is changed, false otherwise

              throws java.io.IOException,
                     java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Saves the user object to user.dat
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if there is a problem loading the object
